name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change My Cursor to GTA Grand Theft Auto 5

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change your cursor to any picture GTA and Includes a link to www.yaagame.com for gaming content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with this fun Chrome extension that changes your default cursor to iconic cursor designs inspired by Grand Theft Auto V. Choose from various cursor styles that capture the essence of the game, bringing a bit of Los Santos into your daily web activities. Whether youâ€™re driving through the streets or planning your next heist, let your cursor reflect your love for GTA V! Easy to install and simple to use, this extension is perfect for gamers and fans alike. Customize your online journey today!
